participant_1.name: Emily
participant_1.personality: Caring and nurturing, with a love for storytelling and family activities.
participant_1.background: i walk three miles every day. i love disneyland and mickey mouse. my favorite way to relax is to read a book. i love to spend time with my family. i am a baby delivery nurse.

participant_2.name: Liam
participant_2.personality: Creative and adventurous, always seeking new experiences and flavors.
participant_2.background: i visit europe twice a year. i'm an art major in college. i love to cook paella. i have a weakness for fish and chips. i'm a descendant of christopher columbus.
